content.question: Which of the following nineteenth-century historical processes gave rise to arguments for regional unity similar to those made by the author?

choices.label: Russia and Great Britain’s struggle for influence over Central Asia
European countries’ efforts to carve out colonial territories during the scramble for Africa
Spanish Latin American colonies’ struggles for independence
The establishment of rival alliances in Western Europe following the unification of Germany

content.answer: Spanish Latin American colonies’ struggles for independence

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
